description.value:
The ghost cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage + 1d6 per 2 levels, subject to a @Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true] save.

For DCs, use the high spell DC of the ghost's level.
